message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I'm confident that you'll find it to be a game-changer for your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm eager to hear your thoughts.

Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $2000000 is a bit steep for my budget. I'm willing to pay $1000000.  This is a fair price considering the value I place on this opportunity.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, thank you for your counteroffer of $1000000. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $1400000. I believe this price reflects the value of the product and I'm confident you'll find it a fair deal.

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $1400000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $1200000, which is my absolute limit. If you're willing to accept that, I'd be happy to proceed with the purchase. Let me know what you think.

Bob, I understand you're willing to go up to $1200000, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make another compromise, so I'm counteroffering $1300000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a fair price for the product.
